description: Building consent document classification and checks - organized by document type

record_of_title.name: Record of Title
record_of_title.description: Land ownership and interests documentation from LINZ

completeness_checks.name: Title Reference
completeness_checks.question: Is a valid title identifier present (e.g., SA21A/1371)?

completeness_checks.name: Registered Owner(s)
completeness_checks.question: Are the registered owner name(s) clearly shown?

completeness_checks.name: Legal Description
completeness_checks.question: Is the legal description (Lot/DP) present?

completeness_checks.name: Estate Type
completeness_checks.question: Is the estate type shown (Fee Simple, Leasehold, etc.)?

completeness_checks.name: Area
completeness_checks.question: Is the land area specified?

completeness_checks.name: Search Date
completeness_checks.question: Is the search copy date shown?

completeness_checks.name: Interests Section
completeness_checks.question: Is there an interests/encumbrances section?

compliance_checks.name: Title Currency
compliance_checks.question: Is the title search dated within the last 3 months?

site_plan.name: Site Plan / Location Plan
site_plan.description: Drawing showing property boundaries, buildings, setbacks and site layout

completeness_checks.name: Site Address
completeness_checks.question: Is the full site/property address shown?

completeness_checks.name: Legal Description
completeness_checks.question: Is the Lot/DP reference shown on the plan?

completeness_checks.name: Scale
completeness_checks.question: Is the drawing scale clearly indicated?

completeness_checks.name: North Arrow
completeness_checks.question: Is the north direction indicated?

completeness_checks.name: Boundary Dimensions
completeness_checks.question: Are all property boundary dimensions shown?

completeness_checks.name: Site Area
completeness_checks.question: Is the total site area specified?

completeness_checks.name: Existing Buildings
completeness_checks.question: Are existing buildings/structures shown and labelled?

completeness_checks.name: Proposed Works
completeness_checks.question: Are proposed works clearly identified and labelled?

completeness_checks.name: Setback Dimensions
completeness_checks.question: Are setback distances from boundaries shown?

completeness_checks.name: Author/Drawn By
completeness_checks.question: Is the author/company who prepared the plan shown?

completeness_checks.name: Date
completeness_checks.question: Is the drawing date or revision date shown?

compliance_checks.name: Site Coverage Limit
compliance_checks.question: Is site coverage within the permitted maximum (typically 35-40%)?

compliance_checks.name: Front Setback
compliance_checks.question: Does the front yard setback meet minimum requirements?

compliance_checks.name: Side Setback
compliance_checks.question: Do side yard setbacks meet minimum requirements?

compliance_checks.name: Vehicle Access
compliance_checks.question: Is vehicle access/driveway to the site shown?

floor_plan.name: Floor Plan
floor_plan.description: Architectural drawing showing room layout, dimensions and door/window positions

completeness_checks.name: Scale
completeness_checks.question: Is the drawing scale indicated?

completeness_checks.name: Room Labels
completeness_checks.question: Are all rooms labelled with their use?

completeness_checks.name: Dimensions
completeness_checks.question: Are key room dimensions shown?

completeness_checks.name: Floor Level
completeness_checks.question: Is the floor level/storey identified?

completeness_checks.name: Door Positions
completeness_checks.question: Are door positions and swings shown?

completeness_checks.name: Window Positions
completeness_checks.question: Are window positions indicated?

elevation.name: Elevation Drawing
elevation.description: External view of building showing height, materials, and facade details

completeness_checks.name: Elevation Direction
completeness_checks.question: Is the elevation direction identified (North, South, etc.)?

completeness_checks.name: Scale
completeness_checks.question: Is the drawing scale indicated?

completeness_checks.name: Height Dimensions
completeness_checks.question: Are building heights shown (floor to ceiling, overall)?

completeness_checks.name: Ground Level
completeness_checks.question: Is the ground/finished floor level shown (RL)?

completeness_checks.name: Materials
completeness_checks.question: Are external materials/finishes indicated?

compliance_checks.name: Height Limit
compliance_checks.question: Is the building height within the permitted maximum?

product_specification.name: Product Specification / Manual
product_specification.description: Technical specifications, installation requirements and compliance data for products

completeness_checks.name: Manufacturer
completeness_checks.question: Is the manufacturer name clearly shown?

completeness_checks.name: Model Name/Number
completeness_checks.question: Is the product model name or number shown?

completeness_checks.name: Clearance Requirements
completeness_checks.question: Are clearance/spacing requirements specified?

completeness_checks.name: Standards Compliance
completeness_checks.question: Are compliance standards referenced (AS/NZS)?

completeness_checks.name: Installation Instructions
completeness_checks.question: Are installation instructions present?

compliance_checks.name: Emissions Rating
compliance_checks.question: Does the product meet emissions requirements (for solid fuel heaters)?

compliance_checks.name: Efficiency Rating
compliance_checks.question: Does the product meet minimum efficiency requirements?

producer_statement.name: Producer Statement (PS1/PS3/PS4)
producer_statement.description: Certification statement from qualified professional confirming design or construction compliance

completeness_checks.name: Issuer Name
completeness_checks.question: Is the issuer's name shown?

completeness_checks.name: Company Name
completeness_checks.question: Is the company/organisation name shown?

completeness_checks.name: Building Consent Number
completeness_checks.question: Is the building consent number referenced?

completeness_checks.name: Project Address
completeness_checks.question: Is the project address shown?

completeness_checks.name: Scope of Work
completeness_checks.question: Is the scope of work clearly defined?

completeness_checks.name: Standards Reference
completeness_checks.question: Are applicable standards referenced (AS/NZS)?

completeness_checks.name: Registration/Accreditation
completeness_checks.question: Is the issuer's registration or accreditation number shown?

completeness_checks.name: Signature
completeness_checks.question: Is the statement signed?

completeness_checks.name: Date
completeness_checks.question: Is the statement dated?

inspection_report.name: Inspection Report
inspection_report.description: Council inspection documentation with findings, outcome and photos

completeness_checks.name: Consent Reference
completeness_checks.question: Is the building consent reference number shown?

completeness_checks.name: Project Address
completeness_checks.question: Is the project location/address shown?

completeness_checks.name: Inspection Date
completeness_checks.question: Is the inspection date clearly shown?

completeness_checks.name: Inspector Name
completeness_checks.question: Is the inspector's name shown?

completeness_checks.name: Inspection Type
completeness_checks.question: Is the inspection type identified (e.g., Final, Pre-line)?

completeness_checks.name: Outcome
completeness_checks.question: Is the inspection outcome (Pass/Fail) clearly stated?

completeness_checks.name: Findings/Notes
completeness_checks.question: Are inspection findings or notes recorded?

authorised_product_list.name: Authorised Product List
authorised_product_list.description: Regulatory authority listing of approved/authorised products

completeness_checks.name: Authority Name
completeness_checks.question: Is the authorising body identified (e.g., Environment Canterbury)?

completeness_checks.name: Product Listed
completeness_checks.question: Is the specific product brand and model listed?

completeness_checks.name: Authorisation Number
completeness_checks.question: Is an authorisation/approval number shown?

construction_detail.name: Construction Detail Drawing
construction_detail.description: Technical detail drawing showing construction methods, materials and assemblies

completeness_checks.name: Detail Title
completeness_checks.question: Is the detail clearly titled/labelled?

completeness_checks.name: Scale
completeness_checks.question: Is the detail scale indicated?

completeness_checks.name: Materials
completeness_checks.question: Are materials/components identified?

completeness_checks.name: Dimensions
completeness_checks.question: Are key dimensions shown?

building_consent_form.name: Building Consent Application Form
building_consent_form.description: Form 2 or Form 5 building consent application/grant documentation

completeness_checks.name: Form Type
completeness_checks.question: Is the form type identified (Form 2, Form 5)?

completeness_checks.name: Consent Number
completeness_checks.question: Is a consent/application number shown?

completeness_checks.name: Site Address
completeness_checks.question: Is the site address shown?

completeness_checks.name: Legal Description
completeness_checks.question: Is the legal description (Lot/DP) shown?

completeness_checks.name: Owner Details
completeness_checks.question: Are owner name and contact details shown?

completeness_checks.name: Work Description
completeness_checks.question: Is the description of building work shown?

code_compliance_certificate.name: Code Compliance Certificate (CCC)
code_compliance_certificate.description: Form 7 Code Compliance Certificate issued under Section 95 Building Act

completeness_checks.name: Form Number
completeness_checks.question: Is it identified as Form 7?

completeness_checks.name: Building Consent Number(s)
completeness_checks.question: Are the covered building consent numbers listed?

completeness_checks.name: Site Address
completeness_checks.question: Is the site address shown?

completeness_checks.name: Issue Date
completeness_checks.question: Is the CCC issue date shown?

completeness_checks.name: Authorised Signature
completeness_checks.question: Is there an authorised officer signature?

unknown.name: Unclassified Document
unknown.description: Document type could not be determined automatically

completeness_checks.name: Document Legible
completeness_checks.question: Is the document legible and readable?

completeness_checks.name: Relevance Clear
completeness_checks.question: Is the document's purpose/relevance identifiable?

solid_fuel_heater.name: Solid Fuel Heater Installation
solid_fuel_heater.description: Installation or replacement of wood burner, pellet fire, or other solid fuel heater

new_dwelling.name: New Dwelling
new_dwelling.description: Construction of a new residential dwelling

minor_works.name: Minor Works / Alterations
minor_works.description: Small alterations, additions or repairs to existing buildings

commercial_fitout.name: Commercial Fitout
commercial_fitout.description: Interior alterations to commercial or retail premises

custom.name: Custom / Other
custom.description: Custom project type - configure documents manually

upload_slots.description: Maps document types to AlphaOne upload categories
